name: Run Stick Run - Jump To Live
name_original: Run Stick Run - Jump To Live
description:
Everyone needs to make a good play…
Unleash your inner player as you avoid the obstacles to score as many points as possible!!!

Help the Stick man to jump from building to building...

[ How to play ]
- tap screen to jump
- tap again to double jump
- avoid colored buildings...

Download it now…
And Enjoy the game!!!
